scripts.install: cd ./back-end && npm i && cd ../front-end && npm i && cd ..
scripts.test: npm test --prefix back-end && npm test --prefix front-end
scripts.watch: npm run be watch & npm run fe start
scripts.build: cd ./front-end && npm i && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.docker-build: npm run build && docker build . -t nghianinhnb/nasa-project
